item.title: Week 06 - The binomial, normal, and poisson
item.description: Reading Please read Open Intro section 3.1 to 3.5 (same as last week) Info Quiz this Wednesday during recitation! ** Will cover material from weeks 3, 4, and 5. Todo Vote on when you would like your midterm! The link is here

item.title: Week 04 - Cond. Prob, Bayes, and Random Variables
item.description: Reading Please read Open Intro section 2.1.5 to 3.4 Info Quiz covering weeks 1, 2, and the first class of week03 will take place on 2020-09-16 (Weds)! HW02 grades will be distributed by the end of Wednesday. Todo

item.title: Week 03 - Foundations of probability theory
item.description: Reading Please read Open Intro section 2.1 to 2.1.5 Info Quiz covering weeks 1, 2, and the first class of week3 will take place on 2020-09-16. HW01 grades will be distributed by the end of Wednesday. Todo (Optional) Send me feedback about the class, what I am doing well, and where I can improve. The Form to fill out is here

item.title: Week 02 - Summaries and relationships between variables
item.description: Reading Please read Open Intro section 1.4 to 1.6 Todo Please signup for a free GitHub account at https://github.com/ and email your username. Please download/install Python 3 on your computer or make sure you can login to the cluster computer. A tutorial for Windows, Linux, and Mac is available here

item.title: Week 01 - Data
item.description: Reading Please read Open Intro section 1.1 to 1.3 Todo (mandatory) Please fill out when you are best available for office hours on this form. I will pick my office hours (EST) based on when students are most available. Todo (Optional, we will go over these in Recitation 01) Please signup for a free GitHub account at https://github.com/ and fill-in this form Please download/install Python 3 on your computer.
